post:
Hello,

I hope it is okay, when I post this here :)

Some weeks ago I ordered two kimsufi's but never really used them.

One Kimsufi 2G, paid until to 1 May this year, it has a Intel Atom 330 with four cores, 2GB RAM, 1TB hdd (Not older than a month, so we could say: new). Normally the server costs 17,99€. Would give it away for ~18€. It has about 5TB Traffic
(dd io-test: ~ >100mb/s!)

And one Kimsufi special Intel E6550 2x2.33 GHz, 2GB RAM, 2*500GB HDD (Software RAID), 10TB Traffic. Paid it until ~15 April. Hm, Would give it away, for also ~14€? It has about 10TB Traffic
(dd io-test: ~85-100mb/s)

But important: I am not a reseller, only want to transfer the servers to another ovh account!

Regards,
Amfy
